biography: Mikael, a familiar name to those frequenting Kurk Golf, has carved a niche for himself not only through his consistent play but also through his famously contemplative demeanor on the course. Known for his meticulous approach to each shot, Mikael brings a level of focus that is admired by peers and spectators alike.

Though some consider him to be retired from Hector Trophée events, Mikael's presence was felt at the Hector Trophée in 2024. While he has yet to secure a victory at the tournament nor capture the Victor Trophy, his participation is a testament to his enduring passion for the game and his dedication to the spirit of competition.
Whether or not Mikael will make a surprise return to the field remains to be seen, but his influence on and off the course is undeniable.
